overview:
mindIT was founded by Mark Van Vessem and Wilson Sands. Our mission continues to be a relentless pursuit to remove the ever-present strain between clients and the reactive traditional support and medical billing model. At mindIT, we mind your billing, software and maintenance so that you can mind your patient’s care. We will achieve this goal by continuously improving the value of our services and focusing on making our clients more efficient, productive, and satisfied.

Our strong belief is that businesses need to concentrate their efforts on utilizing technology to develop their business, not on managing technology itself. Our goal is to provide that technology management for you, while at the same time providing one of the leading medical billing services in the business!
